column4: hey, I can't seem to find a deb package for rarutils... am I just doing something stupid?  (entirely possible)
tools to create and extract .rar files
that's the package
stable == not changing  in this context
just use the mozilla.org binary :)

re. firefox installer - if you install it in your home dir and just link to it, then you can uninstall anytime and not affect the ubuntu packaging system
it works - it's no lamer than compiling something :)
grabbing single packages, on the other hand, is almost asking to break things
good luck - compiling firefox is a nightmare
counterintuitive name of that howto - i was just there

the URL referenced does not show how to install current drivers, which are at 6629 - the deb package is 6111, which is deprecated and a LOT slower
